explains: n. 造成阻塞的东西，阻塞物；堵塞，阻塞

sentences.en: The logical treatment is to remove this blockage.
sentences.cn: 合理的处理方法是清除这种堵塞物。

sentences.en: Blood rushes to your nose and causes a blockage in it.
sentences.cn: 血涌进你的鼻子，造成鼻子堵塞。

sentences.en: The valve failing closed could be due to an internal blockage or failure.
sentences.cn: 阀门无法关闭的原因可能是内部堵塞或故障。
